article_node.title: The World Awaits Trump-Putin Summit
article_node.summary: President Trump is set to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska, with expectations tempered by both leaders. The summit is historic as it marks Putin's first visit to U.S. soil in a decade and comes amid ongoing tensions from the Ukraine conflict. Trump has indicated that while he hopes for a positive outcome, he acknowledges the possibility of failure in the talks. Additionally, the Trump administration is reportedly in discussions to potentially take a stake in Intel to bolster U.S. chip manufacturing.
